tagline: Access 350,000+ recipes, reviews and nutrition facts.
description: Connect to the BigOven recipe API to search and display 350,000+ recipes, reviews and ingredient lists. Test an API call and export the code into your app now.

blocks.name: getSingleRecipeCollection
blocks.description: Gets a recipe collection. A recipe collection is a curated set of recipes.

blocks.name: getRecipeCollectionMetadata
blocks.description: Gets a recipe collection metadata. A recipe collection is a curated set of recipes.

blocks.name: getRecipeCollections
blocks.description: Get the list of current, seasonal recipe collections. From here, you can use the /collection/{id} endpoint to retrieve the recipes in those collections.

blocks.name: getFoodGlossaryArticleByTerm
blocks.description: Get food glossary article by term (e.g., asparagus). This editorial is (c) BigOven and MUST carry attribution and a link back to the glossary entry on BigOven.com.

args.name: term
args.info: Keyword used to look up article, e.g., asparagus.

blocks.name: getFoodGlossaryArticle
blocks.description: Get food glossary article.

blocks.name: deleteItemsFromGroceryList
blocks.description: Delete all the items on a grocery list; faster operation than a sync with deleted items.

blocks.name: getMyGroceryList
blocks.description: Get the user's grocery list. User is determined by Basic Authentication.

blocks.name: departmentalizeItemsInGroceryList
blocks.description: Departmentalize a list of strings. Used for ad-hoc grocery list item addition.

blocks.name: addSingleItemToGroceryList
blocks.description: Add a single line item to the grocery list.

blocks.name: deleteItemFromGroceryList
blocks.description: Will delete this item assuming you own it.

blocks.name: updateGroceryItem
blocks.description: Update a grocery item by GUID

blocks.name: addRecipeToGroceryList
blocks.description: Add a Recipe to the grocery list.

args.name: scale
args.info: Scale=1.0 says to keep the recipe the same size as originally posted.

args.name: markAsPending
args.info: Indicate that the lines in the recipe should be marked in a "pending" (unconfirmed by user) state.

blocks.name: synchronizeGroceryList
blocks.description: Synchronize the grocery list.

args.name: requisiteItems
args.info: Array of JSON objects, grocery list items.

args.name: requisiteRecipes
args.info: Array of JSON objects, grocery list recipes.

blocks.name: createRecipe
blocks.description: Add a new recipe.

blocks.name: updateRecipe
blocks.description: Update a recipe.

args.name: ingredients
args.info: Array of JSON objects, recipe ingredients.

blocks.name: getRecipeAutocomplete
blocks.description: Given a query, return recipe titles starting with query. Query must be at least 3 chars in length.

blocks.name: getRecipeCategories
blocks.description: Get a list of recipe categories.

blocks.name: deleteMyReviewReply
blocks.description: DELETE a reply to a given review. Authenticated user must be the one who originally posted the reply.

blocks.name: updateMyReviewReply
blocks.description: Update (PUT) a reply to a given review. Authenticated user must be the original one that posted the reply.

blocks.name: getSingleReview
blocks.description: Get a given review by string-style ID. This will return a payload with FeaturedReply, ReplyCount. Recommended display is to list top-level reviews with one featured reply underneath. Currently, the FeaturedReply is the most recent one for that rating.

blocks.name: updateReview
blocks.description: Update a given top-level review.

blocks.name: getReviewReplies
blocks.description: Get a paged list of replies for a given review.

blocks.name: addReplyToReview
blocks.description: POST a reply to a given review. The date will be set by server. Note that replies no longer have star ratings, only top-level reviews do.

blocks.name: createRecipeScan
blocks.description: POST an image as a new RecipeScan.

blocks.name: deleteMySingleRecipe
blocks.description: Delete user single recipe.

blocks.name: getMySingleRecipe
blocks.description: Get user single recipe.

blocks.name: createRecipeFeedback
blocks.description: Feedback on a Recipe -- for internal BigOven editors.

args.name: data
args.info: The payload for feedback, which includes the field "feedback".

blocks.name: addRecipeImage
blocks.description: Add recipe image.

blocks.name: createRecipeNote
blocks.description: Create a new note into the system.

args.name: recipeNoteGUID
args.info: Recipe note grocery list item id.

blocks.name: deleteRecipeNote
blocks.description: Delete recipe note.

blocks.name: getMySingleRecipeNote
blocks.description: GET /recipe/{recipeId}/note/{noteId}

args.name: noteId
args.info: The note ID (note -- it's not the RecipeID).

blocks.name: updateRecipeNote
blocks.description: Update a Recipe note (RecipeNote).

args.name: recipeNoteGUID
args.info: Recipe note grocery list item id.

blocks.name: getRecipeNotes
blocks.description: Get recipe notes.

blocks.name: getRecipePhotos
blocks.description: Get all the photos for a recipe

blocks.name: getRelatedRecipes
blocks.description: Get recipes related to the given recipeId.

blocks.name: getMyRecipeReview
blocks.description: Get *my* review for the recipe {recipeId}, where "me" is determined by standard authentication headers

blocks.name: createReview
blocks.description: Add a new review. Only one review can be provided per {userId, recipeId} pair. Otherwise your review will be updated.

blocks.name: getRecipeReviews
blocks.description: Get paged list of reviews for a recipe. Each review will have at most one FeaturedReply, as well as a ReplyCount.

blocks.name: getRecipeScanImages
blocks.description: Gets a list of RecipeScan images for the recipe. There will be at most 3 per recipe.

blocks.name: searchRecipes
blocks.description: Search for recipes. There are many parameters that you can apply.

args.name: searchAnywhereByKeyword
args.info: Search anywhere in the recipe for the keyword.

args.name: folder
args.info: Search in a specific folder name for the authenticated user.

args.name: collectionId
args.info: Limit to a collection ID number.

args.name: filter
args.info: Optionally set to either "myrecipes", "try", "favorites","added" to filter to just the authenticated user's recipe set.

args.name: searchInTitleByKeyword
args.info: Search just in the recipe title for the keyword.

args.name: userId
args.info: Set the target userid to search their public recipes.

args.name: username
args.info: Set the target username to search their public recipes.

args.name: photos
args.info: If set to true, limit search results to photos only.

args.name: boostmine
args.info: If set to true, boost my own recipes in my folders so they show up high in the list (at the expense of other sort orders).

args.name: includeCategoryId
args.info: Integer of the subcategory you'd like to limit searches to (see the /recipe/categories endpoint for available id numbers). For instance, 58 is "Main Dish > Casseroles".

args.name: excludeCategoryId
args.info: Like include_cat, set this to an integer to exclude a specific category.

args.name: includePrimaryCat
args.info: Csv indicating up to three top-level categories -- valid values are [appetizers,bread,breakfast,desserts,drinks,maindish,salads,sidedish,soups,marinades,other].

args.name: includeIngredients
args.info: A CSV representing up to 3 ingredients to include, e.g., tomatoes,corn%20%starch,chicken.

args.name: excludeIngredients
args.info: A CSV representing up to 3 ingredients to exclude  (Powersearch-capable plan required).

args.name: cuisine
args.info: Limit to a specific cuisine. Cooks can enter anything free-form, but the few dozen preconfigured values are Afghan,African,American,American-South,Asian,Australian,Brazilian,Cajun,Canadian,Caribbean,Chinese,Croatian,Cuban,Dessert,Eastern European,English,French,German,Greek,Hawaiian,Hungarian,India,Indian,Irish,Italian,Japanese,Jewish,Korean,Latin,Mediterranean,Mexican,Middle Eastern,Moroccan,Polish,Russian,Scandanavian,Seafood,Southern,Southwestern,Spanish,Tex-Mex,Thai,Vegan,Vegetarian,Vietnamese.

args.name: userset
args.info: If set to a given username, it'll force the search to filter to just that username.

args.name: vegetarian
args.info: When set to 1, limit to vegetarian (Powersearch-capable plan required).

args.name: vegan
args.info: When set to 1, limit to vegan (Powersearch-capable plan required).

args.name: containsCheese
args.info: When set to 1, limit to contains-cheese (Powersearch-capable plan required).

args.name: glutenFree
args.info: When set to 1, limit to gluten-free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

args.name: nutFree
args.info: When set to 1, limit to nut-free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

args.name: dairyFree
args.info: When set to 1, limit to dairy-free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

args.name: seaFoodFree
args.info: When set to 1, limit to seafood-free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

args.name: shellfishFree
args.info: When set to 1, limit to shellfish-free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

args.name: treeNutFree
args.info: When set to 1, limit to tree-nut free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

args.name: whiteMeatFree
args.info: When set to 1, limit to white-meat free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

args.name: redMeatFree
args.info: When set to 1, limit to red-meat free (Powersearch-capable plan required).

args.name: containsPasta
args.info: When set to 1, recipe contains pasta, set to 0 means contains no pasta (Powersearch-capable plan required).

blocks.name: getRandomRecipe
blocks.description: Get a random, home-page-quality Recipe.

blocks.name: getRecipeRaves
blocks.description: Get the recipe/comment tuples for those recipes with 4 or 5 star ratings.

blocks.name: getUserRecentlyViewedRecipes
blocks.description: Get a list of recipes that the authenticated user has most recently viewed.
